caption.center: K.L.S., Appellant, v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal from the Circuit Court for Hillsborough County, Richard A. Nielsen, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
James Marion Moorman, Public Defender, and Judith Ellis, Assistant Public Defender, Bartow, for Appellant.
Charles J. Crist, Jr., Attorney General, Tallahassee, and Chandra Waite Dasrat, Assistant Attorney General, Tampa, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
WHATLEY, SALCINES, and KELLY, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
